Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to manufacturers' reporting the sale or distribution of firearms
Summary: Relates to manufacturers reporting the sale or distribution of firearms to the department of criminal justice services.
LawCode: Add Art 39-DDDD ยง898-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to manufacturers' reporting requirements for the sale or distribution of firearms
